name: Pick a Side Quest
description:
Pick a Side Quest

-is a pixel art puzzle with platformer elements with 3 very difficult levels! 

In it you need to play the blue square and pass difficult levels but just pass the level you will not succeed, because you need to choose the side. On each side there are different items if you activate the item on the left and the action is on the right!But I forgot to warn you here everything geometric...
